name: DANONE NORTH AMERICA PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Monitor issues related to the U.S. agriculture sector, including the dairy industry. Educate Members on the importance of organic standards and regulations. Monitor plant-based labeling requirements a

Monitor issues related to the U.S. agriculture sector, including the dairy industry. Educate Members on the importance of organic standards and regulations. Monitor plant-based labeling requirements a

Monitor issues related to the U.S. agriculture sector, including the dairy industry. Educate Members on the importance of organic standards and regulations. Monitor plant-based labeling requirements a
Monitor issues related to organic agriculture, including integrity and enforcement standards; farm bill implementation for organic and conservation programs for sustainable agriculture; dairy policy;
Monitor issues related to mitigating climate change and legislative issues related to packaging and plastic food containers.
